name: Chiapas Avocado Tofu Scramble
description: This Chiapas tofu avocado scramble, cooked with spices, beans, and tortillas strips. Topped with avocado, crema, and pickled jalapeños.
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp. Avocado oil, (or your oil of preference)
1 cup Cooked pinto beans, (with some broth)

itemListElement.text: Crumble the tofu with your hands, until it has the consistency of scrambled eggs. In a small bowl, mix the garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, nutritional yeast, cumin, and salt. Add this spice mixture to the crumbled tofu and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Crumble the tofu with your hands, until it has the consistency of scrambled eggs. In a small bowl, mix the garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, nutritional yeast, cumin, and salt. Add this spice mixture to the crumbled tofu and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Heat a medium sauté pan to medium heat. Add 1 tbsp. of oil and cook the tofu until golden brown, about 6 to 7 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Heat a medium sauté pan to medium heat. Add 1 tbsp. of oil and cook the tofu until golden brown, about 6 to 7 minutes.

itemListElement.text: In another sauté pan, set to medium heat, add the remaining tbsp. of oil and add the tortilla strips to the pan. Cook until golden brown and remove from the pan.
itemListElement.name: In another sauté pan, set to medium heat, add the remaining tbsp. of oil and add the tortilla strips to the pan. Cook until golden brown and remove from the pan.

itemListElement.text: Add the soupy beans and crispy tortilla strips to the tofu, and mix well. Season to taste.
itemListElement.name: Add the soupy beans and crispy tortilla strips to the tofu, and mix well. Season to taste.

itemListElement.text: Serve topped with slices of vegan cheese, pickled jalapeño peppers, avocado slices, and cashew crema.
itemListElement.name: Serve topped with slices of vegan cheese, pickled jalapeño peppers, avocado slices, and cashew crema.

itemListElement.text: Soak the cashews in ½ cup of water for two hours.
itemListElement.name: Soak the cashews in ½ cup of water for two hours.

itemListElement.text: Once the cashews have soaked, place them in the blender with the soaking water, lemon juice, apple cider vinegar, and salt. Process until completely smooth and cream like.
itemListElement.name: Once the cashews have soaked, place them in the blender with the soaking water, lemon juice, apple cider vinegar, and salt. Process until completely smooth and cream like.
